pannipitiya dharmapala widyalaya ha galla mahinda widyalaya athara tharagaya pannipitiyedi, dharmapala widyala palamu inima - panduwara 66.5 kadi siyalu dena dawi lakunu 137 ( sanjana lanka 44, chamidu samarasinha 23, kushan madhushan 51/6, kawisha wimukthi 20/2 ) mahinda widyala palamu inima - panduwara 61 kadi kadulu 6 kata lakunu 168 (winura dulsara 61, hansaka walihinda 44, ashen kandambi 26, dilshan da silwa 26/3 ) kawindugen wishishta pandu yawimak â€˜singar kusalanaâ€˜ wayasa 13 n pahala krikat tharagawaliye thewani kotase pawathi tharagayakadi pannipitiya dharmaraja widyalata erehiwa pawathi tharagaya inimaka saha lakunu 83 ka jayak labimata shantha thomas widyalaya samath wiya.
